name: Dream Escape(Demo)
description:
Hey buddy I am Dreaming this game every day  when I sleep and i think you are the one who can complete and pull me out of the dream by reaching the other dot show in the map in the parison.

Controls-

WASD and Space Bar- basic movement

W+Space Bar - Stick with the wall

Tab- Hide the cursor

Esc-Unhide Cursor

Spacebar - select the options in the menu
